Header.title: We are ready to Scrape
Header.paragraph: Transform how you gather data with seamless web scraping and PDF extraction solutions. Access, view, and export valuable insights effortlessly!

About.paragraph: PRIMUS Techsystems is a technology company, headquarter in Pune, Magarpatta and specialize in providing enterprise application services focused on SAP Business Suite.PRIMUS enterprise garden solutions and technology expertise brings to customers a range of enterprise solutions and products that enhance performance and competitiveness.

Services.name: SAP S/4 HANA - Next-Generation ERP Software
Services.text: Streamlines finance, supply chain, and product lifecycle management with real-time insights and machine learning, optimizing operations across departments.

Services.name: SAP Application Management Support
Services.text: Drive business transformation by enhancing IT support and maximizing value from your SAP investment.

Features.title: Data Extraction & Storage
Features.text: Automatically scrape data from authorized sources and securely store it in various formats.

Features.title: Customized Display
Features.text: Present extracted data in tables, charts, or graphs with search and filter options.

Features.title: Scheduled Scraping
Features.text: Set up periodic data collection from national websites for continuous updates.

Features.title: Secure Access and Export
Features.text: Ensure authorized user access with login credentials and enable data export in multiple formats.
